title: Billards Xciting [Pal], Ps2
description:
Billards Xciting for the Ps2                                        Rel. 02/27/2004


Format:        CD-R PAL
Lang.:         English
Discs:         1
Image:         MDS/MDF
Genre.:        Sports, Pool Table
Requirements:  Modded/Chipped Ps2 or Swap Magic Disc Method. 


Compressed with 7Zip, Game was tested and works.


Note: No Ps2 backup disc/game or copy will work unless your Ps2 Console is Modded 
      (allows playing of backups), or if you use Swap Magic.


Important - This is a CD-R or Compact Disc Type Ps2 Game, So you'll have to use 
            CD-R Media only to burn with.


Release Notes - There will be a delay when starting the game after the Ps2-logo.
                just be patient it loads. It's just the way the game was made. 
                The Game could not be patched to Ntsc, Nor rebuilt to DVD. So it  
                had to be left in Pal and in the CD-R Format. If you don't have 
                the pal standard, a Multi System TV (NTSC/PAL),or converter  
                there's no point in playing this game if you have a Ntsc tv/ps2
                only. As the screen color will be in black & white and just roll.



You could try the homebrew exploit to (Free Mc Boot - Also known as soft modding for ps2), if your ps2 system isn't hard modded with a chip or if Swap Magic isn't working as a last resort. There are ps2 emulators but its not 100% & the quality isn't as good as playing your game on your ps2 console.

If your using swap magic and don't have a flip top, you'll need to first
remove the front cover of the disc tray for use of the slide card.

Here's a link for how to remove the front cover...
          <a href="
http://www.modchipstore.com/support/index.php?_m=knowledgebase&_a=viewarticle&kbarticleid=49&nav=0,2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.modchipstore.com/support/index.php?_m=knowledgebase&_a=viewarticle&kbarticleid=49&nav=0,2</a>

And here's some links on using the slide tool to open the tray to swap in your ps2 copy or backup game.
          <a href="
http://www.swapmagic3.com/slide-tool/Instructions.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.swapmagic3.com/slide-tool/Instructions.htm</a>
         <a href="
http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/340944" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/340944</a>
         <a href="
http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/15105" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.afterdawn.com/thread_view.cfm/15105</a>

Those that don't have a modded Ps2 Here's a few links for Free MC Boot & how to use it to soft mod your ps2 so you can be able to play burned games. Free Mc Boot won't work on newer models of ps2 you'll have to use an older version the tutorial explains this.

-- <a href=" http://bootleg.sksapps.com/tutorials/fmcb/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://bootleg.sksapps.com/tutorials/fmcb/</a>

Then you will also need to patch the iso (the PS2 game) with ESR disc patcher GUI v0.24a if your using free mc boot with ESR Elf to boot your p2 copies or backups (No-swapping required for esr method).

After patching burn the iso with Imgburn or Dvd Decrypter to respectable media
then use the ESR through fmcb after you installed everything to boot your game.

You will still need to use the proper media for the game to run or load properly regardless if your using fmcb, a modded ps2, or swap magic. Verbatim or Taiyo Yuden is preferred.

Note: If fmcb isn't working and your Ps2 isn't Modded, Swap Magic should do the
trick.


Game Description:

Billiards Xciting delivers all the awesome gameplay found in pool with solid graphics and precision ball movement, with a system that makes it possible to play repeatedly by matching the playing conditions. Billiards has never been this real!



Game Pics Included.


Burn with Alcohol 120%, (Included in Download).

Set Datatype to Playstation 2, (Write Method Raw/Dao) and Burn at 8x speed.


Use Verbatim or Taiyo Yuden CD-R Media for best quality, or if other media isn't 
working. 


(NO CD-RW will not work).


Any Problems or questions please post a comment.


If this is working fine for you let us know write a comment.


Please Seed this when your done.

(I can't seed 24/7, do your part and seed to keep the torrent healthy).



Enjoy!
